system.description:
When you persuade an NPC with seduction, promises, or threats, roll with HEART.

If you cash in a Debt with the NPC before you roll, add +3 to your total (max +4).

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: On a hit, they see your point and do as you ask. On a 7-9, they counter your offer or demand payment—a Debt, a favor, resources—before agreeing to follow through.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, they see your point and do as you ask.
